# Class EmojiRemover

Text processor that removes emoji characters from text streams. Extends the StreamTextProcessor with emoji removal functionality.

##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Methods

destroy getIterator create createInstance

## Constructors

### constructor

  * new EmojiRemover(textStream: any, destroy: VoidFunction): [EmojiRemover]()

Creates a new StreamTextProcessor instance.

#### Parameters

    * textStream: any

External reference to the text stream

    * destroy: VoidFunction

Function to call when destroying the processor

#### Returns [EmojiRemover]()

Inherited from StreamTextProcessor.constructor
